weaknesses: accessibility: Chord labels (Fmaj7, Em7, etc.) have extremely poor contrast ratio (~2.3:1) against dark background
accessibility: No visible focus indicators on settings and upload buttons
visual hierarchy: Chord labels compete visually with lyrics - unclear if chords or lyrics are primary
color & contrast: Gray lyrics text (#6B7280) on black background provides marginal contrast (~4.8:1)
typography: Inconsistent text sizing between chord labels and lyrics creates visual tension
spacing & layout: Excessive vertical spacing between lyric lines reduces readability and requires more scrolling
